'''Chad''' is the brother of [[Ryan]], the first penile transplant recipient in the US.

==History==
===Ryan's Surgery===
Chad came to [[Seattle]] with Ryan when the time came for him to receive his penis transplant. He and his brother were very close. Chad was very concerned with Ryan's surgery going well and him being pleased with the result. Once the surgery was complete, Ryan offered Chad one free look, but Chad declined, saying he was happy if Ryan was happy.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
Chad is very close to his brother, Ryan, the first penis transplant recipient in the country.
